body_text: The behavior of moving all the items if none are selected makes it really easy for a user to accidentally lose all of their changes. I think we should take it out.
body: The behavior of moving _all_ the items if none are selected makes it really easy for a user to accidentally lose all of their changes. I think we should take it out.
